pre_caption: In this close-up shot, a cracked, semi-transparent object occupies the right foreground. In the bottom-left foreground, a silver hammer head and a thin metal rod are partially visible, while colorful spheres and sticks rest in the top-left background. As the camera, positioned at the subject's level, moves forward and pans slightly to the right, the hammer and rod exit the frame from the bottom left. Concurrently, the spheres and sticks in the background shift into the middle ground before also exiting the frame from the left, leaving the cracked object as the primary focus on the right side of the frame.
